page.title: 13A Day at School
page.content: When I wake each morning I put on my nightcoat and go downstairs for my breakfast.At 8.30 I leave for school with my little sister.She goes to the Infants and I go to the juniors where I wait for my best friend at the gate. When Mr.Simpson has blown the whistle I go inside and change my shoes then I rush to get out the hymn books for assembly. After assembly we have our lessons until playtime (10.30) and after 20 minutes we come into the class again until 12.00 and then we have our lunch. Some people go home, some bring sandwiches but most stay for a school dinner. Playtime in the afternoon is from 2.30 until 2.45 and at 3.45 we go home.l go to bed at about 8.00 each evening. (Written by Sonia Phillips) {
